data.title: US Appeals Court Backs Fed’s Decision to Deny Custodia Bank a Master Account
data.description:

source: https://cryptonews.com/news/us-appeals-court-backs-feds-decision-to-deny-custodia-bank-a-master-account/

data.title: Elon Musk Announces Upcoming Launch of X Chat App with Enhanced Encryption
data.description:
According to Foresight News, Elon Musk revealed on the 'Joe Rogan Experience' podcast plans to launch a standalone communication app called X Chat, designed to compete with Telegram and WhatsApp. The app is expected to be available in the coming months.

Originally part of the X integrated application, Musk stated that the development team has restructured X Chat into an independent app. He criticized WhatsApp for claiming end-to-end encryption while retaining metadata that advertisers can use to understand user behavior. In contrast, X Chat will employ peer-to-peer encryption technology similar to Bitcoin, ensuring no information is left for advertisers to exploit.

data.title: U.S. Restaurant Chain Partners with Fold for Bitcoin Rewards
data.description: According to Foresight News, a U.S. restaurant chain has teamed up with Bitcoin service company Fold to launch a new promotional campaign. Customers purchasing the new Bitcoin burger can receive a $5 Bitcoin rebate. Additionally, the brand has announced the establishment of a Bitcoin reserve, where all Bitcoin used for customer payments will be deposited. Furthermore, the company will donate 210 sats from each Bitcoin meal to Open Sats, an organization supporting Bitcoin open-source contributors.

data.title: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang Sells Over $1 Billion in Stock Since June
data.description: According to Odaily, Nvidia's CEO Jensen Huang has sold more than $1 billion worth of stock since June, as part of a large pre-planned stock sale. Recent reports indicate that Huang sold 25,000 shares on Friday.

data.title: U.S. Stock Market Sees Modest Gains; Crypto Stocks Surge
data.description:
According to Odaily, the U.S. stock market closed with slight increases across major indices. The Dow Jones Industrial Average rose by 0.09%, the S&P 500 increased by 0.26%, and the Nasdaq Composite gained 0.61%. Crypto-related stocks experienced significant growth, with ALTS rising 9.57%, SBET up 8.38%, MSTR increasing 5.87%, and BMNR advancing 4.71%.

The data was sourced from msx.com, a decentralized platform specializing in Real World Asset (RWA) trading. The platform has launched hundreds of RWA tokens, including those representing major U.S. stocks and ETFs such as AAPL, AMZN, GOOGL, META, MSFT, NFLX, and NVDA.

data.title: Bitcoin mining company TeraWulf completes $1.025 billion convertible senior note issuance.
data.description: Nasdaq-listed Bitcoin mining company TeraWulf announced the completion of a $1.025 billion convertible senior note offering, an increase from its previously planned $900 million private placement. This includes an additional $125 million in notes issued due to the exercise of additional purchase options by initial purchasers. After deducting related expenses, the company raised approximately $999.7 million in net proceeds, which will be used for the construction of its Abernathy, Texas data center campus and other corporate operations. (Globenewswire)

data.title: Garden Finance Faces $11 Million Loss Due to Solver Attack
data.description: According to Odaily, Garden Finance co-founder Jaz Gulati announced on the X platform that the project suffered a loss of approximately $11 million due to an attack on a solver. The team is currently collaborating with security partners to investigate and track the incident. Gulati emphasized that user funds remain unaffected, and the event only involved a single solver, posing no impact on the protocol's operation or overall security.

data.title: Federal Reserve Board Member Predicts December Rate Cut
data.description: According to BlockBeats, Federal Reserve Board member Milan has indicated that forecasts suggest another interest rate cut in December.

data.title: Garden Finance co-founder confirmed a loss of approximately $11 million due to the attack, but user funds were not affected.
data.description: According to a post on the X platform by Garden Finance co-founder Jaz Gulati, the project suffered a loss of approximately $11 million due to an attack on its solver. The team is currently investigating and tracking the incident with security partners. Jaz Gulati emphasized that user funds were unaffected, the incident only involved a single solver, and had no impact on the protocol's operation or overall security.

data.title: ether.fi: TVL surpasses $11.5 billion, Q3 fee revenue reaches $77 million.
data.description: Ether.Fi, a liquidity staking infrastructure, released quarterly data on its X platform, disclosing that its total value locked (TVL) reached $11.51 billion, a 78% increase quarter-over-quarter; third-quarter fee revenue reached $77 million, an 85% increase quarter-over-quarter; and third-quarter protocol revenue reached $16.9 million, a 78% increase quarter-over-quarter. In addition, its monthly active users have approached 30,000.

data.title: Steak ‘n Shake Launches Bitcoin Treasury, Vows to Donate 210 Sats per Meal
data.description:
Steak ‘n Shake has launched a Bitcoin treasury, pledging to store all BTC payments from restaurant sales in a strategic reserve.
source: https://cryptonews.com/news/steak-n-shake-launches-bitcoin-treasury-vows-to-donate-210-sats-per-meal/

data.title: MEXC Apologizes After Wrongfully Freezing $3M From Crypto Whale ‘The White Whale’
data.description:
Crypto exchange MEXC has issued a public apology after freezing $3 million belonging to a well-known trader known as The White Whale.
source: https://cryptonews.com/news/mexc-apologizes-after-wrongfully-freezing-3m-from-crypto-whale-the-white-whale/

data.title: The Quantum Threat: How New Machines Could Break Bitcoin’s Code
data.description:
As quantum computing inches closer to real-world viability, experts warn that Bitcoin’s cryptographic foundations could one day be cracked open.
source: https://coindoo.com/the-quantum-threat-how-new-machines-could-break-bitcoins-code/

data.title: The two whales profited over $4 million from their long positions in ZEC, but still have an overall unrealized loss of approximately $5 million.
data.description: According to OnchainLens monitoring, as ZEC's market capitalization surpassed XMR, two whales holding positions on HyperLiquid have profited significantly from their long positions. The newly created address 0x519c holds a 5x long position in ZEC, currently showing a floating profit of approximately $2.2 million; address 0x549e also holds a 5x long position in ZEC, with a floating profit of approximately $1.8 million, and simultaneously holds a 10x long position in HYPE, with a total floating profit of approximately $2.3 million. However, their overall accounts are still in a state of floating loss exceeding $5 million.

data.title: Stablecoin issuers rake in 75% of crypto revenue
